verses.1: Egypt gam panin Israel mite a paikhiat zawh kum za li le kum sawm giatna, Israel-te tungah Solomonʼ uk a kum lina, a kha nihna ahi Ziv kha-in amah in Topaʼ biakinn lam ding kipan hi.
verses.2: Kumpi Solomon in Topa adingin a lam biakinn, a sung pi sawm kua sau-in, pi sawm thum zai a, pi sawm le nga sang hi.
verses.3: Biakinn mai ah a innliim pen biakinn zaina zahin pi sawm thum sau a, inn mai lamah pi sawm le nga sang hi.
verses.4: Tua ciangin amah in biakinn adingin a pualam a kihui tawlette a bawl hi.
verses.5: Amah in biakinn pang tuak le a nung lam biakinn kawm kimkotin a kawm tungah zong inn lam a, a kimkot a pangah inn dei bawl hi.
verses.6: A dawl nuainung pen pi sagih le alang zai-in, a laita pi kua zai a, a thumna pi sawm le alang zai hi. Kawm sungah innkam a lut loh nadingin amah in inn pualam pang kimkot a dingin a nanna singbekte a bawl hi.
verses.7: Biakinn a kilam ciangin a kitawhna mun panin a kibawl sa suangte tawh kilam hi. Tua ahih manin a kilam laitakin hei ahi a, sek ahi a, sik nazat khat peuhpeuh ahi zongin a gingte biakinn huang sungah kiza lo hi.
verses.8: A dawl nuainung lut nading pen biakinn leitaw lam pangah om hi. A dawl laita ah kahlei zui-in kipai-in a dawl laita panin a thumna ah kipai hi.
verses.9: Tua ahih ciangin amah in biakinn lamin a zo hi. Amah in innkamte khungin taamtak peekte tawh inndap a bawl hi.
verses.10: Amah in a inn buppi tungah a lambehte zomin, dawl khat ciangin pi sagih le alang sang ciat a, taamtak singte-in a biakinn tawh kizom hi.
verses.11: Tu-in Topaʼ thu Solomonʼ tungah hong tunga,
verses.12: “Nangmah in na lam hih biakinn tawh kisai-in, ka thukhamte zui-in ka ngeina kipte mang a, ka thupiaknate khempeuh kemin tuate na zuih leh, na pa David tungah ka gen thu nangʼ tungah kong kipsak ding hi.
verses.13: Tua ciangin na lam biakinn sung Israel mite lakah ka teeng dinga, keima mi Israel-te ka nusia kei ding hi,” a ci hi.
verses.14: Tua ahih ciangin Solomon in biakinn lamin a zo hi.
verses.15: Amah in taamtak peekte tawh biakinn sung kawm dap hi. Sual panin inndap innsunte dongin amah in sing tawh a sung lam tuam hi. Tua ciangin amah in taaksan peekte tawh a sual tuam hi.
verses.16: Amah in sual panin innsun dong inn nung lam pi sawm thum taamtak peekte tawh lam a, amah in siangtho pen mun, biakinn sung nung dingin a inn sungah a bawl hi.
verses.17: Biakinn sung nung mai-a inn sung, pi sawm guk sau hi.
verses.18: Inn sunga om taamtak singte tungah umgah le pakpalh lim kigelh hi. A vekpi-in taamtak a kidap hi a, suang kimu lo hi.
verses.19: Amah in Topaʼ Thuciamna Singkuang koih nadingin a sung tawng pen ah biakinn sung nung a bawl hi.
verses.20: Biakinn sung nung, pi sawm thum sau-in, pi sawm thum mah zai a, pi sawm thum mah sang a, amah in kham citak tawh a zut hi. Amah in taamtak sing biakna tau khat zong a bawl hi.
verses.21: Tua ciangin Solomon in kham citak tawh inn sung zut a, biakinn sung nung mai kantanin kham khainiang khung a, kham tawh a zut hi.
verses.22: Amah in a inn buppi a zawh dongin kham tawh a zut hi. Biakinn sung nung a biakna tau buppi zong amah in kham tawh a zut hi.
verses.23: Amah in biakinn sung nungah oliv sing tawh kherub nih bawl a, pi sawm le nga tuak a sang hi.
verses.24: Kherub kha lang khat, pi sagih le alang sau-in, kherub kha lang dang khat, pi sagih le alang mah sau a, a kha lang khat mong panin a mong lang khat dong pi sawm le nga ahi hi.
verses.25: Kherub a dang khat zong pi sawm le nga mah sau a, Kherub tegel a sauna le a pian lim kibang hi.
verses.26: Kherub khat a sauna pi sawm le nga hi a, a kherub dang khat zong tua zah mah ahi hi.
verses.27: Amah in biakinn sung tawngnung pen ah kherub-te a koih hi. Kherub-teʼ khate kizal a, khatʼ kha in kawm banin, a dang kherubʼ kha in a kawm lang khat ban hi. Amauʼ kha lang khat tegel inn laizang ah kituah hi.
verses.28: Amah in kham tawh tua kherub-te a zut hi.
verses.29: Amah in a sung nung le a pua nung inn deite, a kimkotin inn kawm khempeuh tungah kherub-te le nisuh kungte le pakpalhte a bawl hi.
verses.30: A sung nung le a pua nung inn dei sung innsualte amah in kham tawh a zut hi.
verses.31: Biakinn sung nung lut nadingin amah in oliv sing kongkhak peekte a bawl hi; a baang tung zawl le kongkhak khuamte in kiu nga piangsak hi.
verses.32: Amah in kherub-te, nisuh kungte le pakpalh lim kibawlte tawh oliv sing kongkhak peek nihte a tuam hi; amah in tuate kham tawh zut a, kherub-te le nisuh kungte tungah kham a theh hi.
verses.33: Tua bangmahin amah in kiu li nei-in biakinn sung lutna oliv sing kongkhak khuamte,
verses.34: le taaksan sing kongkhak peek nihte a bawl hi. Kongkhak a peek nihte kikhepin, a dang kongkhak a peek nihte zong kikhep hi.
verses.35: Tuate tungah amah in kherub-te le nisuh kungte le pakpalhte bawl a, tua a bawlte tungah a tukimin kham tawh a zut hi.
verses.36: Amah in a kiseek suang gual thum le taamtak sing gual khat tawh a tual sung nung a bawl hi.
verses.37: A kum lina, Ziv kha-in Topaʼ biakinn a bulpi kipan hi.
verses.38: A kum sawm le kum khatna, a kha giatna ahi Bul kha-in a na khempeuh le a kigen khempeuh bangin a kizo hi. Amah in tua a lamna-in kum sagih sung hun a bei hi.
